import React from "react"; const botTypeClasses = { Assault: "icon military", Defender: "icon shield", Support: "icon plus circle", Medic: "icon ambulance", Witch: "icon magic", Captain: "icon star", }; function BotSpecs({ bot, addBotToList, goBackHandler }) { const addHandler = () => addBotToList(bot.id, bot); return (

Name: {bot.name}

Catchphrase: {bot.catchphrase}

Class: {bot.bot_class}
{bot.health}
{bot.damage}
{bot.armor}
); } export default BotSpecs;
